text: Jafar Mohammadpour ( جعفر محمدپور, born 20 February 1994 in Tabriz) is a former Iranian football player and current football coach. He played for clubs such as Gostaresh Foolad F.C., Machine Sazi F.C., and Oghab Tehran F.C.. He is now a certified coach by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) and works with the youth teams at Tractor S.C. in Tabriz. He is also the founder and manager of Kahkeshan Football Club in Tabriz. ==Career== Mohammadpour began his football journey in Tabriz. During his career, he played for several clubs including Gostaresh Foolad, Machine Sazi, Oghab Tabriz, and Oghab Tehran (during military service). He also played for the provincial school and university teams of East Azerbaijan. After finishing his playing career, he became a Physical Education teacher at the Ministry of Education. He later became a coach and worked at clubs like Oghab Tabriz, Shahrdari Tabriz Academy, and now Tractor's academy. ==Personal life== He holds a bachelor's degree in Physical Education and lives in Tabriz. ==References== * Mehr News Agency (2024-02-28). تیم فوتبال کهکشان تبریز در لیگ نونهالان حضور دارد. * Mehr News Agency (2024-02-26). سرمربی تیم نونهالان کهکشان: هدف ما ساخت بازیکن برای آینده است. * Mehr News Agency (2023-11-26). مسابقات لیگ نونهالان کشور آغاز شد. * Asr Azadi Online (2024-03-04). فوتبال پایه تبریز نیازمند حمایت است. * IRNA (2014-02-05). تیم امید گسترش فولاد مقابل پاسارگاد خرم‌آباد پیروز شد. * Khabarban (2023). کهکشان تبریز در لیگ‌های پایه حضور فعال دارد. * ISNA (2014-02-14). جوانان ملوان تیم دبیری تبریز را شکست دادند. ==Other websites== * Instagram profile (optional) Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers
title: Jafar Mohammadpour
